image.alt: Cosse & Silmon Orthodontics office and team

paragraphs.text: Every smile we craft is backed by thoughtful care, advanced diagnostics, and a belief that orthodontics should enhance your whole life, not just your teeth. We guide, support, and celebrate with you at every visit.
Schedule your complimentary consultation today and begin the journey to a smile that opens doors.

items.title: Health‑First Orthodontics
items.text: From airway assessments to sleep-focused treatment, we look beyond the smile to support total well‑being.

items.title: Joy in the Journey
items.text: Treatment should be comfortable and even fun for patients of all ages; our team brings energy, compassion, and a family atmosphere.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.text: We use modern diagnostics and systems like clear aligners, iTero scanning, and the Damon System to deliver efficient, high‑quality care.

button.label: Learn More
button.aria_label: Learn more about what sets us apart

paragraphs.text: Dr. Christopher Cosse, DDS, trained at LSU and completed his orthodontic certificate at Oregon Health & Science University. A certified Invisalign and Damon provider, he studies airway function and innovative techniques to shorten treatment time while keeping care patient‑centered and even fun.

Dr. Jeff Silmon, DDS, has been transforming smiles in the Shreveport–Bossier area since 2005. A Damon and Invisalign provider, he focuses on modern techniques that reduce treatment time while creating a welcoming, kid‑friendly environment.

Dr. Logan Cash joins the team from the University of Kentucky. Curious and family‑focused, he brings a learning mindset to care and a genuine enthusiasm for helping patients feel confident about their smiles.

Dr. Peter H. Nasser brings more than three decades of orthodontic experience. A Diplomate of the American Board of Orthodontics and Assistant Clinical Professor at LSU Medical Center, he focuses on personalized care and mentoring the next generation of orthodontists.

button.label: Meet Dr. Nasser
button.aria_label: Learn about Dr. Peter H. Nasser

paragraphs.text: From discreet clear aligners to advanced bracket systems and retention programs, we offer options for kids, teens, and adults using modern scanning and treatment tools.

image.alt: Clear aligners for adults and teens

testimonials.author: Shane M.
testimonials.testimonial: “Being an adult, I was a little apprehensive about seeing an orthodontist. The doctors and staff made me feel so comfortable, and I am so glad I decided to fix the things about my smile that have bothered me for so long.”

testimonials.author: Madi R.
testimonials.testimonial: “I always have an awesome time at my appointments, and I love how I feel like I have a second family at Cosse and Silmon Orthodontics! I want to work here when I grow up!”

testimonials.author: Taylor B.
testimonials.testimonial: “My daughter went from being so embarrassed about her teeth and never smiling, to being one of the most outgoing little girls in her class! Dr. Chris and Dr. Jeff did such an amazing job on her smile!”

testimonials.author: Brian H.
testimonials.testimonial: “I cannot say enough great things about Cosse and Silmon Orthodontics! The doctors and staff are the best–hands down! It is always fun from the moment you walk in the door. This is the place to be!”

og_meta.title: Home - Cosse & Silmon Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Cosse & Silmon Orthodontics delivers modern, family-friendly orthodontic care in Shreveport–Bossier, offering clear aligners, Damon braces, retention, and free

image.alt: Cosse & Silmon Orthodontics doctors and staff group photo

paragraphs.text: Every smile we craft is backed by thoughtful care, advanced diagnostics, and a belief that orthodontics should enhance your whole life, not just your teeth. We create individualized treatment plans and use modern technology to improve efficiency without sacrificing quality.

Our approach is health‑first: we include airway and sleep‑focused assessments when indicated and tailor care around each patient’s needs and lifestyle. That means treatment that may improve oral health, function, and confidence at the same time.

We offer a full range of options, from contemporary bracket systems to in‑house clear aligner work and Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, delivered with gentle techniques and flexible scheduling to fit busy lives.
Above all, we aim to make orthodontic care accessible and comfortable. Patients leave our office with better oral health, a smile they’re proud of, and the confidence to share it.

Chris Cosse, DDS is a Shreveport‑Bossier native and a practicing orthodontist driven by innovation and patient care. Since joining practice with his mentor in 2000, Dr. Cosse has focused on delivering excellent results while keeping the experience positive and engaging for patients of all ages.
He leads clinical work that blends traditional orthodontic systems with modern techniques to reduce visits and improve outcomes, and he continues to teach and present nationally and internationally.

image.alt: Dr. Chris Cosse smiling in office

paragraphs.text: Dr. Cosse completed undergraduate studies at Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge), attended dental training at LSU School of New Orleans, and received his certificate in orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics from Oregon Health & Science University.

His advanced study included a thesis on airway function and Class II correction and a study term at the University of Freiburg in Germany to compare orthodontic and prosthodontic approaches internationally.

image.alt: Dr. Chris Cosse in treatment room

paragraphs.text: Dr. Cosse is a certified provider of Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, Invisalign Teen, Insignia, Vector TADs, and the Damon System, and he holds the Damon Premier Provider & Educator designation.

He is part of international expert groups such as The Insiders and The Pathfinders, holds multiple orthodontic patents (15), and is active in speaking and education on cutting‑edge orthodontic techniques.

image.alt: Dr. Chris Cosse presenting at a conference

paragraphs.text: When he’s not caring for patients, Dr. Cosse enjoys time with his wife Stacy and their four children, spending time in the community, and continuing work on innovation in orthodontic devices and software.

Jeffrey Silmon, DDS has been transforming smiles in the Shreveport‑Bossier area since 2005. He focuses on reducing treatment time with modern techniques while creating a fun, comfortable environment for children and families.

Dr. Silmon graduated from LSU (Baton Rouge) and earned his dental degree and orthodontic specialty training at LSU School of Dentistry in New Orleans. He was recognized with the J. Jerome Hebert Award of Orthodontic Excellence during his residency.

Dr. Silmon is a certified provider of the Damon systems, Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, Invisalign Teen, and Vector Temporary Anchorage Devices. He is a member of national and state dental organizations and participates in programs such as Give Kids a Smile.
Like Dr. Cosse, he holds the Damon Premier Provider & Educator designation and remains active in continuing education and professional groups that advance efficient, high‑quality care.

image.alt: Dr. Jeff Silmon speaking at a seminar

paragraphs.text: Dr. Jeff enjoys family life with his wife Meredith and their children, playing golf, supporting LSU sports, and traveling. He prioritizes making visits enjoyable for younger patients so families leave visits with smiles.

Dr. Logan Cash trained at the University of Kentucky and brings a collaborative, lifelong‑learner mindset to the practice. He values a team culture focused on constant improvement and patient‑centered care.

image.alt: Dr. Logan Cash consulting with patient

paragraphs.text: Dr. Cash completed his orthodontic training at the University of Kentucky and joins the practice with a strong clinical foundation and a family history in dentistry and orthodontics.

image.alt: Dr. Logan Cash in the office

paragraphs.text: Logan and his wife Lauren are excited to call Shreveport home with their children Avie and Benji and family dog Roux. He emphasizes humility, continuous learning, and community engagement in his practice.
“I love to learn. Curiosity keeps me going,” Dr. Cash says, and he looks forward to growing with the community while delivering thoughtful orthodontic care.

Dr. Peter H. Nasser is a seasoned orthodontist with more than 30 years of experience. A native of Shreveport, he brings deep local ties and a long history of personalized care to patients across the area.

image.alt: Dr. Peter H. Nasser with patient

paragraphs.text: Dr. Nasser earned a BS from LSU‑Shreveport and completed his dental degree and orthodontic specialty certificate at LSU School of Dentistry in New Orleans. He earned Diplomate status with the American Board of Orthodontics in 1991.

Dr. Nasser serves as an Assistant Clinical Professor at LSU Medical Center and frequently lectures around Shreveport‑Bossier on oral health topics. His practice emphasis is personalized care and education for patients and the community.

image.alt: Dr. Peter H. Nasser presenting to a class

og_meta.description: Learn about Cosse & Silmon Orthodontics, our doctors, team, community programs, and health‑first approach to orthodontic care in Shreveport and surrounding area

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at Lakeshore Orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: Book a free scan and evaluation at our Shreveport or Bossier scan centers to begin. Your visit includes a free exam with X-rays and a 3D scan so our team can assess your needs.
A licensed orthodontist will review your scan and determine whether CSO CLEAR aligners are a safe, effective option for your smile.
If you qualify, we’ll present personalized treatment options and a clear pricing plan so you can choose the level that fits your goals and budget.
Ready to start? Schedule your free scan and leave with a plan to a more confident smile.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: Beautiful smiles don’t have to break the bank. CSO CLEAR offers tiered treatment levels with transparent pricing and flexible payment plans to fit a variety of needs.
All CSO CLEAR plans require a one-time down payment unless paying in full. Our team can help customize monthly terms so your care is affordable and predictable.

CSO CLEAR aligners use a series of custom-made, clear trays to gently move teeth toward their desired position. Each tray is worn for a set period, then replaced with the next in the series so movement happens gradually and predictably.
Aligners are virtually invisible and removable for eating and cleaning. We use a 3D scan to design your plan, and a doctor reviews your records to confirm suitability and expected timing.

image.alt: Patient filling out orthodontic health history forms online
Cosse & Silmon Orthodontics doctors and team

seo.page_description: Learn how CSO CLEAR aligners work, review pricing levels, and book a free scan at Cosse & Silmon Orthodontics' Shreveport or Bossier scan centers.
seo.page_keywords: CSO CLEAR, clear aligners, aligners in an hour, Cosse & Silmon Orthodontics, scan center, Shreveport, Bossier

og_meta.title: Get Started | CSO CLEAR
og_meta.description: Learn how CSO CLEAR aligners work, review pricing levels, and book a free scan at Cosse & Silmon Orthodontics' Shreveport or Bossier scan centers.

image.alt: Smiling patients of all ages at Lakeshore Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Traditional metal braces remain a reliable option for correcting tooth alignment and bite issues. Small brackets and wires apply controlled pressure to move teeth into place; patients commonly experience some soreness after placement or adjustments, which typically eases in a few days.

image.alt: Two stylish smiling teens taking selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Ceramic or clear braces blend with your tooth color for a more discreet look while treating complex alignment problems. They offer effectiveness similar to metal braces but may require extra care to avoid staining and are slightly more fragile.

The DAMON™ Smile system uses self-ligating brackets designed to move teeth efficiently with reduced friction. Many patients experience improved comfort, easier cleaning, and potentially shorter treatment times compared with traditional systems.
Damon Clear combines the benefits of self-ligating mechanics with tooth-colored ceramic brackets for a discreet option that still offers reliable movement and patient comfort.

CSO CLEAR offers in-office, custom clear aligners that can be made quickly using 3D scanning. With Aligners in an Hour™, a local orthodontist evaluates your smile and, if you qualify, leaves you with custom aligners the same day.

Treatment levels range from minor single-tooth adjustments to more comprehensive plans. A doctor reviews your scan and X-rays to confirm candidacy and recommend the right level and payment plan for your needs.

Clear aligners use a series of removable, custom-made trays to gradually shift teeth. They are discreet, removable for eating and hygiene, and effective for a wide range of orthodontic concerns when monitored with regular checkups and proper wear.

image.alt: Profile image showing clear aligner treatment

paragraphs.text: Myobrace focuses on correcting oral habits such as mouth breathing, tongue thrusting, and thumb sucking to support natural jaw and dental development. The system uses removable appliances along with exercises to help prevent more invasive treatment later.

I-CAT® FLX 3D imaging captures detailed 3D views of the mouth and jaws to improve diagnosis and treatment planning. It supports orthodontic evaluation, TMJ assessment, and sleep apnea planning while offering quick scans and low radiation exposure.

image.alt: Cosse & Silmon Orthodontics doctors and team
